subject: World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, announced on Friday that a committee would examine a possible schedule change for the 2022 World Cup in Qatar and report back next year.
snippet: FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, announced on Friday that a committee would examine a possible schedule change for the 2022 World Cup in Qatar and report back next year.
